publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4172 Stuart McMillan: Construction Plus Partnership for Inverclyde—That the Parliament welcomes the approval by Inverclyde Council to introduce the Construction Plus Partnership, which will guarantee local training and job opportunities in Inverclyde; notes that the Construction Plus Partnership has already seen the company build the Riverside Business Centre and recruit six local groundsmen, a heating engineer and a quantity surveyor, and acknowledges that the scheme will bring much needed job opportunities for Inverclyde that are vital during these difficult economic times. Supported by: Ross Finnie*, Alasdair Allan*, Kenneth Gibson*
S3M-4172 Construction Plus Partnership for Inverclyde (lodged on 18 May 2009) Sandra White*, Gil Paterson*

S3M-4172 Stuart McMillan: Construction Plus Partnership for Inverclyde—That the Parliament welcomes the approval by Inverclyde Council to introduce the Construction Plus Partnership, which will guarantee local training and job opportunities in Inverclyde; notes that the Construction Plus Partnership has already seen the company build the Riverside Business Centre and recruit six local groundsmen, a heating engineer and a quantity surveyor, and acknowledges that the scheme will bring much needed job opportunities for Inverclyde that are vital during these difficult economic times. Supported by: Ross Finnie, Alasdair Allan, Kenneth Gibson, Sandra White, Gil Paterson
S3M-4172 Construction Plus Partnership for Inverclyde (lodged on 18 May 2009) Christina McKelvie*
